pages.title: Crystal Shards
pages.text: To start generating ores, you are going to need to make some crystals.$(br2)Smelt some crystals, and then crush them with the crushing block.
Craft some shears and make as many of these as you can afford.
Crush these by dropping a $(bold)crushing block$() on them.
Gather four $(bold)Shards of the Sacred Land$().
